prontera,164,171,3	script	กระสุน	10249,{
	menu
	"Arrow (ซื้อลูกเดียวพอ)",-
	,"Bullet (ซื้อลูกเดียวพอ)",L_Bullet
	,"Shuriken (ซื้อลูกเดียวพอ)",L_Shuriken
	,"Kunai (ซื้อลูกเดียวพอ)",L_Kunai
	,"Throw Weapon (ซื้อลูกเดียวพอ)",L_ThrowWeapon
	,"Cannon Ball (ซื้อลูกเดียวพอ)",L_CannonBall
	//,"Pack กระสุน",L_Pack
	;
	.@variableName$ = "ShopArrow";
	goto L_Confirmation;
	
	L_Bullet:
	.@variableName$ = "ShopBullet";
	goto L_Confirmation;
	
	L_Shuriken:
	.@variableName$ = "ShopShuriken";
	goto L_Confirmation;
	
	L_Kunai:
	.@variableName$ = "ShopKunai";
	goto L_Confirmation;
	
	L_ThrowWeapon:
	.@variableName$ = "ShopThrowWeapon";
	goto L_Confirmation;
	
	L_CannonBall:
	.@variableName$ = "ShopCannonBall";
	goto L_Confirmation;
	
	L_Confirmation:
	.@shopName$ = .@variableName$;
	callshop .@shopName$,1;
	end;
	
	L_Pack:
	menu
	"Pack Arrow",L_ArrowBox
	,"Pack Bullet",L_BulletBox
	,"Pack Kunai",L_KunaiBox
	,"Pack Mechanic",L_MechanicBox
	,"Pack Talisman",L_TalismanBox
	;
	
	L_ArrowBox:
	callshop "Quiver_Archer",1;
	end;
	
	L_BulletBox:
	callshop "Box_Exchange_Gunslinger",1;
	end;
	
	L_KunaiBox:
	callshop "Box_Exchange_Ninja",1;
	end;
	
	L_MechanicBox:
	callshop "Box_Exchange_Mechanic",1;
	end;
	
	L_TalismanBox:
	callshop "Talisman_Bundle",1;
	end;
}

prontera,164,156,3	script	Pet	564,{
	mes "โปรดระวัง Pet บางตัวไม่มีข้อมูล";
	next;
	mes "โปรดระวัง Pet บางตัวไม่มีข้อมูล..";
	next;
	mes "โปรดระวัง Pet บางตัวไม่มีข้อมูล...";
	next;
	menu
	"หน้าที่ 1",L_PetPage1
	,"หน้าที่ 2",L_PetPage2
	;
	
	L_PetPage1:
	callshop "PetEgg1",1;
	end;
	
	L_PetPage2:
	callshop "PetEgg2",1;
	end;
}

-	shop	PetEgg1	-1,no,9001:10000,9002:10000,9003:10000,9004:10000,9005:10000,9006:10000,9007:10000,9008:10000,9009:10000,9010:10000,9011:10000,9012:10000,9013:10000,9014:10000,9015:10000,9016:10000,9017:10000,9018:10000,9019:10000,9020:10000,9021:10000,9022:10000,9023:10000,9024:10000,9025:10000,9026:10000,9027:10000,9028:10000,9029:10000,9030:10000,9031:10000,9032:10000,9033:10000,9034:10000,9035:10000,9036:10000,9037:10000,9038:10000,9039:10000,9040:10000,9041:10000,9042:10000,9043:10000,9044:10000,9045:10000,9046:10000,9047:10000,9048:10000,9049:10000,9050:10000,9051:10000,9052:10000,9053:10000,9054:10000,9055:10000,9056:10000,9057:10000,9058:10000,9059:10000,9060:10000,9061:10000,9062:10000,9063:10000,9064:10000,9065:10000,9066:10000,9067:10000,9068:10000,9069:10000,9070:10000,9071:10000,9072:10000,9073:10000,9074:10000,9075:10000,9076:10000,9077:10000,9078:10000,9079:10000,9080:10000,9087:10000,9088:10000,9089:10000,9090:10000,9091:10000,9092:10000,9093:10000,9094:10000,9095:10000,9096:10000,9097:10000,9098:10000,9099:10000,9100:10000,9101:10000,9102:10000,9103:10000,9104:10000,9105:10000,9106:10000

-	shop	ShopMysteryUsable	-1,501:-1

prontera,164,150,3	script	ของกดใช้แปลก ๆ	564,{
	mes " Reset ของในร้านใหม่ทุก ๆ 1 ชั่วโมง";
	next;
	callshop .shopName$,1;
	end;
	
GetItemId:
	return $buffIds[rand(getarraysize($buffIds))];
	
GetPrice:
	setarray .@randomPrices[0],900,19000,4500;
	return .@randomPrices[rand(getarraysize(.@randomPrices))];
	
OnMinute00:
OnRefreshShop:
	deletearray $mysteryUsableShopItemIds[0],getarraysize($mysteryUsableShopItemIds);
	
	setarray $mysteryUsableShopItemIds[0]
	,callsub(GetItemId),callsub(GetItemId),callsub(GetItemId),callsub(GetItemId),callsub(GetItemId)
	,callsub(GetItemId),callsub(GetItemId),callsub(GetItemId),callsub(GetItemId),callsub(GetItemId)
	,callsub(GetItemId),callsub(GetItemId),callsub(GetItemId),callsub(GetItemId),callsub(GetItemId)
	,callsub(GetItemId),callsub(GetItemId),callsub(GetItemId),callsub(GetItemId),callsub(GetItemId)
	,callsub(GetItemId),callsub(GetItemId),callsub(GetItemId),callsub(GetItemId),callsub(GetItemId)
	;
	
	deletearray $mysteryUsableShopPrices[0],getarraysize($mysteryUsableShopPrices);
	
	setarray $mysteryUsableShopPrices[0]
	,callsub(GetPrice),callsub(GetPrice),callsub(GetPrice),callsub(GetPrice),callsub(GetPrice)
	,callsub(GetPrice),callsub(GetPrice),callsub(GetPrice),callsub(GetPrice),callsub(GetPrice)
	,callsub(GetPrice),callsub(GetPrice),callsub(GetPrice),callsub(GetPrice),callsub(GetPrice)
	,callsub(GetPrice),callsub(GetPrice),callsub(GetPrice),callsub(GetPrice),callsub(GetPrice)
	,callsub(GetPrice),callsub(GetPrice),callsub(GetPrice),callsub(GetPrice),callsub(GetPrice)
	;
	
ApplyShop:
	npcshopitem .shopName$
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[0],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[0]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[1],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[1]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[2],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[2]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[3],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[3]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[4],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[4]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[5],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[5]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[6],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[6]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[7],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[7]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[8],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[8]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[9],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[9]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[10],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[10]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[11],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[11]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[12],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[12]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[13],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[13]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[14],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[14]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[15],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[15]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[16],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[16]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[17],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[17]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[18],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[18]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[19],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[19]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[20],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[20]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[21],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[21]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[22],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[22]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[23],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[23]
	,$mysteryUsableShopItemIds[24],$mysteryUsableShopPrices[24]
	;
	end;
	
OnSetup:
	if(!$isMysteryInit)
	{
		$isMysteryInit = 1;
		callsub(OnRefreshShop);
	}
	end;
	
OnInit:
	.shopName$ = "ShopMysteryUsable";
	if($isMysteryInit)
	callsub(ApplyShop);
	end;
}
